description: Die My Love review: Lynne Ramsay's film is a raw depiction of an internally suffocating mother, featuring an exceptional performance from Jennifer Lawrence and great support from Robert Pattinson and Sissy Spacek.

description: Mass Effect fans have uncovered fresh artwork teasing the franchise's next game, which will feature the krogan race in the middle of a civil war.

description: This weekend, you can grab tickets for BlizzCon 2026, available for a limited time with early bird pricing.

description: Marvel is set to release the official prequel to Predator: Badlands soon, and we've got an exclusive preview of this violent new story.

description: The discount ends tomorrow.

author: Christian Wait
description: s of Nov. 7, Apple Watch Series 10 models are down to $229 at Walmart and $329 on Amazon. AliExpress has huge pre-Black Friday discounts on FDM 3D printers from Anycubic, Creality, and Flashforge starting at $157. Plus, Pokémon TCG’s Phantasmal Flames Booster Bundle preorders are live at Amazon and Barnes & Noble.
title: Deals for Today: Massive Discounts on Apple Watch 10 and FDM 3D Printers

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick is defending the company's culture and labor record against accusations of union busting, saying Take-Two is "incredibly proud" of its labor relations.
title: Take-Two CEO Says 'Our Culture Is Extraordinary' Amid Accusations of Union Busting at GTA 6 Dev Rockstar Games

description: Major movie news incoming: Quentin Tarantino’s Kill Bill is going to finally be released as one film, and the new version, Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair, now has a brand spanking new trailer.

description: With Black Ops 7 just around the corner, we revisit the entire BLOPS timeline to catch up on the story so far.

description: Mass Effect developer BioWare has reaffirmed its commitment to making the series' next game, just weeks after publisher EA agreed a $55 billion deal to go private.
title: EA and BioWare 'Remain Committed' To Next Mass Effect Game — And Yes, Romances Will Return

author: Lex Briscuso
description: This might be a big one, folks. The first teaser trailer for the upcoming Michael Jackson biopic film Michael has been released — and believe it or not, the sneak peek racked up a whopping 30 million views in its first six hours online.

description: Amazon's upcoming Mass Effect TV adaptation will focus on an original story rather than rehashing BioWare's classic trilogy of video games starring Commander Shepard.

description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton is suing Roblox for allegedly "deceiving parents" and "flagrantly ignoring" safety laws.
title: Texas Sues Roblox, Alleging It 'Flagrantly Ignores Safety Laws' And 'Deceives Parents About the Dangers of Its Platform'

description: The LEGO Star Wars Advent Calendar 2025 has dropped to $26.99 at both Amazon and Target, making for a 40% discount from its usual price of $44.99.

description: Cygames and Konami Digital Entertainment announced today that they have resolved their patent disagreement regarding Cygames’ mobile title Uma Musume Pretty Derby.

title: Rockstar Updates Main GTA 6 Website With New Release Date and — Sorry PC Gamers — It's Still Down for PS5 and Xbox Series X and S Only

author: Tom Phillips
description: From Red and Blue to Scarlet and Violet, Pokémon is known for often launching its games with two different versions — and now, Nintendo's Shigeru Miyamoto has discussed one of the reasons why: to try and rival the sales of his own creation, Super Mario.
title: Pokémon Began Selling Two Versions of Each Game To Try and Beat Mario, Nintendo's Shigeru Miyamoto Says

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has suggested it is comfortable with Switch 2's current price point, despite rising component costs and recent price hikes by both PlayStation and Xbox.
title: After Xbox And PlayStation Price Hikes, Nintendo President Plays Down Fears of Switch 2 Cost Rises

description: GTA 6 is delayed again, this time from May to November 2026. But how has the internet reacted to the GTA 6 delay?
title: Publisher Jokes, Concern, and a Lot of Memes — the Internet Reacts to the GTA 6 Delay

author: Vikki Blake
description: Hot on the heels of the GTA 6 delay, it looks like GTA 5 is returning to PlayStation Plus.
title: GTA 6 May Have Been Delayed, But At Least It Looks Like GTA 5 is Returning to PS Plus

description: Netflix has released the first five minutes of Stranger Things Season 5, showing a crucial moment in the story that teases answers to one of the biggest questions fans had from Season 1.
title: Netflix Releases First 5 Minutes of Stranger Things Season 5, Revealing What Happened to a De-Aged Will Byers in the Upside Down

description: Some of the best sets in the galaxy.
title: The Best LEGO Star Wars Sets to Build in 2025

author: Christian Wait
description: Pokémon TCG’s Phantasmal Flames Booster Bundle preorders are finally live at Amazon for $59.99, which is around market value. Based on Japan’s Inferno X, this set spotlights Mega Charizard X, Mega Lopunny, and Mega Gengar. ETBs have been selling out quickly, so act fast if you’re planning to build your Phantasmal Flames deck or chase top-tier pulls.
title: Amazon Restocks Pokémon TCG: Phantasmal Flames Booster Bundle Preorders Ahead of Its Black Friday Sales

author: Tom Phillips
description: Stranger Things stars Millie Bobbie Brown and David Harbour reunited at last night's Stranger Things Season 5 premiere, just days after a report claimed the young star had filed "pages and pages of accusations" concerning the Marvel actor's behavior ahead of production on the Netflix hit's final season.
title: Millie Bobbie Brown and David Harbour Reunite at Stranger Things Premiere as Director Dismisses 'Bullying' Concerns as 'Wildly Inaccurate'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Sony is suing an eBay seller for allegedly selling counterfeit PS5 accessories, requesting up to $2 million for "each and every use of the PlayStation Trademarks."
title: Sony Sues eBay Seller Over Alleged Counterfeit PS5 Accessories, Including $90 Carry Case, Asking for $2 Million for 'Each and Every Use of the PlayStation Trademark'

author: Michael Cripe
description: Take-Two Interactive CEO Strauss Zelnick is teasing a bright future for the Mafia franchise after Mafia: The Old Country "performed well ahead of expectations."
title: Take-Two Boss Confident in Mafia Franchise After The Old Country Performs 'Well Ahead of Expectations'

author: Michael Cripe
description: Take-Two Interactive says it is confident Borderlands 4 will rebound after technical issues led to “a little bit of softness” for U.S. sales at launch.
title: Borderlands 4 Sales 'A Little Bit Soft' Due to PC Technical Issues, Take-Two Boss Says, but He's Confident It Will Catch Up

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Petit Planet being an online HoYoverse game is a potential massive strength. Progression has been clear and fun so far, and knowing how HoYoverse has supported its other big games, it's highly probable that we'll see this get plenty of updates, events, and regular quality-of-life support. Mobai mentioned that we don't have a "restaurant yet," and I'm already eyeing cute cosmetics I want to save for and whole furniture sets I want to craft. The data from my playtime will all be wiped, but I still couldn't help but be excited about what the upgrades I've earned will bring to my planet tomorrow.
title: Petit Planet Is Like Animal Crossing Meets The Little Prince

author: Scott Collura
description: Pluribus Review: Breaking Bad creator Vince Gilligan goes sci-fi with his new Apple TV series starring Rhea Seehorn.
title: Pluribus Series Premiere Review
